RasterFunctionTemplate.Name: NDVI - with VRE Raw
RasterFunctionTemplate.Description: The NDVI - with VRE(NDRE) Raw index is computed as NIR(Band08)-VRE(Band05)/NIR(Band08)+VRE(Band05), also known as NDRE (Normalized Difference Red Edge) and is more appropriate than NDVI index for intensive management applications throughout the growing season. It is a modification of the NDVI index, however works as a better measure of vegetation health than NDVI especially for mid-late season crops that have elevated levels of chlorophyll because VRE bands are more translucent to leaves than red light and hence is seldom completely absorbed by a canopy.
